\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{operator$<$$<$()}{operator<<()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily \label{inet__address_8h_aee3525ccc1b208bbc9ead201fb999487} 
std\+::ostream \& sockpp\+::operator$<$$<$ (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{std\+::ostream \&}]{os}{, }\item[{const \mbox{\hyperlink{classsockpp_1_1inet__address}{inet\+\_\+address}} \&}]{addr}{}\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



Stream inserter for the address. 

This uses the simple dot notation of the address as returned from inet\+\_\+ntop(). It does not attempt a host lookup. 
\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em os} & The output stream \\
\hline
{\em addr} & The address \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
A reference to the output stream. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
